about_the_game:
Rhythm Nights is an exhilarating Beat Smasher designed from the ground up to be experienced through YOUR music!
Challenge the 4th dimensional hypercubes as you advance your way through up to 24 levels of dynamic and adaptive difficulty.

There's no need to wait for limited music packs or engage with complicated plugins, just click on your favorite song and hit PLAY.
You'll find our rhythm analysis system to be far more advanced than anything you may have experienced.

Beats are extracted, musical measures are defined, and the entire experience magically becomes crafted around your favorite jams. If you don't feel tingles in the back of your neck, we haven't done our job.

Engage with your music like never before!

Features :
* Integrated Music Importer
* Audio Reactive settings and controls
* Calorie Counter
* Static and In-Motion Experiences included

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470 or better
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card Required
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
